FuncDef:
The trust upstream command binds a DS domain to an AAA domain to support BA classification and modify the priorities of IP packets and MPLS packets.
The undo trust upstream command unbinds a DS domain from an AAA domain.
By default, no DS domain is binded to an AAA domain.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a DS domain. A DS domain consists of a group of connected DS nodes that provide the same service policy and implement the same PHB set.
The value is a string of 1 to 48 case-sensitive characters.

Specifies the default DS domain, which is predefined in the system.
-

ExtraInfo: To configure the traffic policy based on BA classification on an AAA domain (such as the priorities of IP packets and MPLS packets), you can configure a DS domain on the AAA domain and configure the mappings between priorities and DS domains.
